name: Xuan-Yuan Sword V
summary: This game is a turn-based RPG. The protagonist, Lu Chengxuan, possesses great power but cannot control it. By a twist of fate, he arrives in the mythical realm of Shanhai, where he meets a variety of wonderful companions from different species. Together, they unravel the mysteries of the Shanhai realm, the Yellow Emperor, and the Xuanyuan Sword, embarking on an exciting journey filled with climactic turns.
